items.name: SWPPP Plan Design
items.description: Stormwater Pollution Prevention Plan - complete drawing set with site map, drainage areas, BMP locations & erosion control details

items.name: SWPPP Narrative
items.description: Written compliance document detailing site conditions, pollution sources, inspection schedules & BMP maintenance procedures

items.name: SWPPP Narrative (Standalone)
items.description: Standalone narrative for sites with existing plan drawings - includes pollution prevention procedures & inspection protocols

items.name: Replacement Narrative
items.description: Updated narrative for permit transfers, site changes, or expired documents

items.name: SWPPP Inspection
items.description: Certified site inspection per EPA/ADEQ requirements - includes photo documentation & compliance report

items.name: Rock Entrance w/ Fabric
items.description: Stabilized construction entrance - 6" rock over filter fabric to prevent sediment tracking onto public roads

items.name: Rumble Grates Rental
items.description: Steel grate system for tire cleaning - prevents mud/sediment tracking at site entrances

items.name: Compost Filter Sock (9")
items.description: Mesh tube filled with compost - filters sediment from sheet flow runoff at site perimeters

items.name: Wire-Backed Silt Fence
items.description: Heavy-duty silt fence with steel T-post support - traps sediment from stormwater runoff

items.name: Drop Inlet Protection
items.description: Filter barrier around storm drain grates - prevents sediment from entering drainage system

items.name: Curb Inlet Protection
items.description: Filter barrier for curb-style storm drains - blocks sediment while allowing water flow

items.name: ERTEC Size 1
items.description: ERTEC brand inlet protection

items.name: Spill Kit
items.description: Emergency response kit for fuel/oil spills - includes absorbents, disposal bags & instructions

items.name: SWPPP Sign
items.description: Required job site sign displaying permit info, emergency contacts & pollution hotline

items.name: Fire Access Sign
items.description: Posted fire lane signage for emergency vehicle access - meets municipal fire code

items.name: Concrete Washout (15 yd)
items.description: 15 cubic yard contained washout basin - captures concrete truck rinse water to prevent runoff

items.description: Dust permit for 1-5 acre sites - includes ADEQ filing & dust control plan preparation

items.description: Dust permit for 100-500 acre sites - includes ADEQ filing & dust control plan preparation

items.description: Dust permit for 500+ acre sites - includes ADEQ filing & dust control plan preparation

items.description: Freshwater + waste tank system for job site trailers - includes plumbing connections & setup

items.description: Potable water tank for job site trailers - includes pump & plumbing connections

items.description: Twice-weekly waste tank pump-out & freshwater refill

items.description: Weekly service for both freshwater & waste tanks - includes pump-out & refill

items.description: Twice-weekly service for both freshwater & waste tanks

items.name: Waste Tank Removal
items.description: Final pump-out & tank removal at project completion

items.name: Freshwater Tank Rental

items.name: 10 yd Roll-Off
items.description: 10 cubic yard dumpster for small jobs - includes 2 tons disposal

items.description: 15 cubic yard dumpster for residential/light commercial - includes 2 tons disposal

items.description: 20 cubic yard dumpster for mid-size projects - includes 2 tons disposal

items.description: 30 cubic yard dumpster for large projects - includes 3 tons disposal

items.name: 40 yd Roll-Off
items.description: 40 cubic yard dumpster for major construction - includes 4 tons disposal

items.name: 15 yd Roll-Off (Inert)
items.description: For concrete, asphalt, dirt & rock only (no wood, drywall, or trash) - includes 2 tons disposal

items.name: Disposal Overage
items.description: Additional disposal fee for weight exceeding included tonnage

items.name: Extended Rental
items.description: Daily fee when container sits 21+ days without haul - exchange resets the clock

items.name: Trip/Relocation
items.description: On-site container relocation or non-scheduled service visit

items.description: Monday-Friday once daily service (2 hr min)

items.description: Large capacity truck for perk tests, flow tests, or lot washing (2 hr min)

items.name: Water Truck - 2000 Gallon

items.name: Street Sweeper - Full Day
items.description: Full-day dedicated sweeper for high-traffic sites or final clean-up (8 hr min)

items.description: Hot/cold pressure washing for concrete, equipment, or building exteriors (2 hr min)

items.name: Pressure Wash - After Hours
items.description: After-hours pressure washing for occupied buildings or night pours (2 hr min)

items.description: Industrial floor scrubber for warehouse, garage, or interior concrete cleaning

items.name: Ride-on Garage Sweeper
items.description: Mechanical sweeper for parking garages & enclosed structures

items.name: Pressure Wash - Extra Labor
items.description: Additional crew member for large-area or detailed work
